Html:
Hi,

As Prism is the new Cab/SCSF i am looking at how i can migrate to this new framwork. Can i use my Windows form views in prism, or do i have to rewite it all in WPF.

Hi,

Nice to see that you considered to start using Prism. There is an specific documentation as starting point in Prism out-of-the-box. So, you could take a look at the following documentation section on MSDN: Upgrading from the Composite UI Application Block

I hope you can find this helpful.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
